div.span: When the user closes his/her text editor...
Process last N days of tickler Todos.
Process all Todos in your inbox (i.e. all Todos tagged with the @inbox context).
Collect Todos to add to daily (i.e. "today.txt") file.
If Todos are left in daily file from last run...
Collect any todos left over in daily file from last run (verify user is OK with this).
Prompt for a list of contexts that we will collect Todos from.
For each context selected, prompt (using fuzzy matching) for Todos to add to daily file.
Open daily file in text editor.
Ask for verification / more information about Todo changes that we are unsure of.
